/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/c.title: Curtains
/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/c.content: Fabricon manufactures custom made curtains to fit your unique space. Whether you are inclosing a outdoor patio or creating a studio for your business, Fabricon’s expertise can help you achieve the desired outcome. With a wide variety of fabrics on the market Fabricon can help you choose the right fabric for your application.

/products/fabric_structures/tensile.title: Tensile
/products/fabric_structures/tensile.content: Tensile fabric structures are quickly becoming a viable alternative to traditional construction methods due to it’s unlimited designs. These structures are gaining popularity throughout the world because of their lower construction cost and use of less materials during construction. With today’s modern fabrics like PTFE, ETFE and PVC these structures are expected to last longer than traditional construction materials. All while creating energy savings through the translucent nature of these fabrics.

/products/services.title: Services
/products/services.content:
Services
The diverse world of fabrics has allowed Fabricon to design and manufacture fabric structures like rigid frame awnings, canopies, wall tents and tipis that are not only functional but will enhance the look of your business, home or city. We will listen to your needs and suggest the best fabric and design to ensure the desired outcome is achieved. From start to finish Fabricon has over 41 years of experience in the fabric industry. Fabric structures have been utilized for thousands of years due to its strength and flexibility that no other building material can achieve.

Design
Our heritage goes back to designing and manufacturing era authentic Native American tipis and Outfitting gear such as horse packing equipment and wall tents. We have designed a wide variety of fabric structures and awnings throughout western Montana and the world. From small half dome awnings to cover your entry way or visually stunning and functional shade sails to add the finishing touch to your patio. Fabricon also features High quality retractable awnings and screen shades that will lower the cooling cost of you home or business during the summer months.

Manufacturing
We specialize in making unique pieces that are not only functional but also enhance the aesthetics of your property. Our facility allows us to design and fabricate custom awnings, fabrics and wall tents.

Consultation
Fabricon is constantly consulting on some of the most innovative fabric structures in the world. Fabricon has been trusted to design Monuments (Rosebud Tribal Veterans Cemetery Committal Shelter), City Pavilions (Caras Park Pavilion) and amphitheaters (Harbourfront Amphitheater).

Repair
We have the expertise to repair most fabric products from large scale wedding tents to simple zipper repairs. Contact us at 406-728-8300 for all your repair inquires.

/home.title: Fabricon - Fabric Contractors
/home.content:
Thank you for your interest in our fabric inspired products and projects.

Fabrics are our primary medium, our goal is to look for and select the appropriate fabrics for a project, whether natural or synthetic. Defining and matching an end products needs with the fabric properties improves the looks, performance and value of any end project. Though we focus and use a few choice fabrics, there are many resources that are virtually endless when it comes to our background.

Our construction techniques include sewn, welded or chemical bonding matching the construction technique that provides the desired outcome.

We work with and explore the most overlooked construction materials available, fabric. It has provided solutions to most of our needs since antiquity. Few materials can truly show superiority when deployed and used correctly enabling improvised solutions not available or found in other types of construction methods.

Foremost, it’s fabric’s flexibility that allows for creative shapes in design, the ability to be deployable and used at multiple locations.
Second is Translucency allowing views to the sky and soft daylight to come through lowering the need for consumptive artificial lighting in the daytime while using nighttime lighting that turns projects iconic.

Todays technical fabrics and films are arriving in endless varieties which can be engineered
to the demands put on them. Whether it be as lifesaving fuse in an animal tracking collar or a 200M free spanned structure we look for the correct material for the job.


Fabricon is here to help put together your next specialty fabric project.

/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/s.title: Screens
/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/s.content: Screen shades are an environmentally friendly alternative to costly air conditioning. The woven glass fabrics used in this application enables the user to block UV heat before entering the home or business, without obstructing the view from the window. When screen shades are strategically placed the need for traditional air conditioning is non existent. With the introduction of electric motors to screen shade systems allows the user to operated with the push of a button, or pair your system to your favorite mobile device and keep your space cool from anywhere in the world.

/products/fabric_structures/frame_suppor.title: Frame-Supported
/products/fabric_structures/frame_suppor.content: Frame Supported fabric structures are a great solution for permanent coverage needs all while creating unique shapes only fabrics can achieve. They can be manufactured for the specific needs of the customer. From full to semi enclosed spaces, Frame supported fabric structures come in all shapes and size. With the use of modern day fabrics like PTFE, ETFE and HDPE the expected life span is comparable to traditional used construction methods.

/products/fabric_structures/tents.title: Tents
/products/fabric_structures/tents.content: Fabricon started as Blue Star Tent and Tipi manufacturing high quality wall tents and outfitting gear. The Blue Star legacy continues with Fabricon today and our superior quality of fabrics and manufacturing process ensures your purchase will last for many years to come. Fabricon offers a wide variety of tent sizes and options as well as custom sizes. Contact Fabricon today for more infromation.

/products/awnings_and_canopies.title: Awnings
/products/awnings_and_canopies.content: The beauty of fabric awnings is that they can be rigid and permanent or deployable and temporary. multiple styles, systems and a range of fabrics and colors unavailable in any other medium. Applications are aesthetic and functional, from providing shade and sun control to element protection over desired areas. A Retractable or Fixed Frame awning can be a valuable addition to your commercial or residential needs. Have an existing awning but need new fabric? We re-skin existing retractable and rigid frame awnings to your needs. Contact Fabricon today and let us help you with your fabric needs.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/canopies.title: Canopies
/products/awnings_and_canopies/canopies.content: Canopies can come in unlimited designs, styles, fabrics and colors. They can be a fixed molded shape or deployable in creative ways. Fabricon can help design and fabricate the canopy that gives your home or business its own unique identity. Just like awnings, canopies can be illuminated for 24 hour security and signage. Easily transform previous unusable space with addition of a custom fabricated canopy from Fabricon.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/retractab.title: Retractable
/products/awnings_and_canopies/retractab.content: Adding a retractable awning to any building or residence will enhance and maximize your outdoor space. There are a wide variety of applications that can provide shade on demand. Retractable awnings that are strategically placed will also help lower the cooling cost of your business or home. The sleek design and quality manufacturing makes your investment in retractable awning pay for itself. You can even operate your retractable awning anywhere in the world through you cellphone or computer, just because you are not home doesn’t mean your retractable awning can’t help cool your home. They also feature wind sensors that will automatically retract protecting your awning from potential damage. Fabricon’s has years of experience servicing and installing retractable awnings in both a commercial and residential settings. We have hundreds of fabric options available and fabricate your fabric canopy in house to ensure a sharp tailored look. We have several custom valance options adding the finishing touch. Let Fabricon help you with all your retractable awning needs.

/products/fabric_structures/tipis.title: Tipis
/products/fabric_structures/tipis.content: Fabricon’s Tipi’s have been featured in major motion pictures and several are on display at prominent museums such as the Smithsonian for their authenticity. Crafted from the finest materials and superior construction methods ensure your investment in a Tipi from Fabricon will last for generations.

/products/fabric_structures/shade_sails.title: Shade Sails
/products/fabric_structures/shade_sails.content: Shade Sails can create a dynamic look to either commercial or residential clients. Shade Sails are commonly tensioned between strategic anchor points creating unique convex, concave or parabolic shapes. They can be manufactured to provide limited shade and maximum aesthetics or full space coverage depending on what best suits your needs. The use of glass coated mesh fabrics provide ample shade and heat control all while letting light penetrate creating a useable space.

/products/fabric_structures.title: Fabric Structures
/products/fabric_structures.content:
Fabric structures have been around since man first started weaving fibers together to make fabrics. Modern day fabric structures are becoming more popular due to the advancement of modern day synthetic fabrics, inexpensive cost compared to other construction methods and architects can achieve unique design elements only fabric can create. Larger fabric structures become focal points of forward thinking communities while providing the desired look and function. Whether you need a decorative entrance to your building or a amphitheater to host your cities festivities Fabricon has the expertise to design and build your fabric structure.

Their “light” footsteps have been known and demonstrated countless times throughout history and pre-history(something our earliest ancestors knew) yet they receive remarkably little exposure here in the schools of North America. Compared to what other countries-including some still considered 3rd world-have come to realize. Not only is fabric a very viable structural material and protective cladding from the elements, it achieves design capabilities and energy savings other materials are incapable of matching. These structures use far less raw materials that are usually consumed in conventional structures along their ability to be repurposed or recycled allows for a more versatile structure. Their luminosity cuts the need for daytime lighting combined with heat reflect-ability to lower cooling requirements, these are only the beginning of a list of advantages fabric has a building material in the 21st century and beyond as new fibers and technology develops.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/commercia.title: Commercial
/products/awnings_and_canopies/commercia.content: Fabricon has been designing and making awnings for commercial and residential clients 1996. Creating eye catching designs and graphics that make your business or home stand out from others. Ideal for both identification and environmental protection for customers all while providing cooling shade during hot the summer months.

/products/custom.title: Custom
/products/custom.content: At Fabricon we pride ourselves on tackling some of the more complicated and one off fabric projects. Over the years we have completed several custom fabric products for the military, private industry and residential customers with the most exacting standards. From a simple boat cover to the fabrication of specialty electron tents, Fabricon’s years of experience means your custom fabric project is in the right hands.

/about.title: About Fabricon
/about.content:
Fabricon as our name suggests focuses in the construction and use of specialty fabrics whether that be consulting, contracting and/or constructing in their applications.
Our palette consists of acrylics, cotton, glass, nylon, polyester, PTFE and HDPE while our expertise and list of materials grows.

While our focus is fabric, we continually integrate with many other materials whether that be aluminum, cable, concrete, steel, wood or composites.
Our products and services cover tents and tipis made from cotton canvas, awnings and canopies of woven acrylics, polyesters and pvc's to sophisticated tensile and frame structures created from a wide array of films and fabrics chosen for performance and needs of situations encountered.

Fabricon also provides metal bending/fabrication and decorating of the fabrics with various forms of signage.

Our services include design/consulting, engineering, fabrication and installation of specialty fabric products and structures locally and around the world.
Whether we can provide guidance in finding the optimum shape or best performing material for a project we excel/shine at one of a kind bespoke designs by providing advanced preparation in careful planning and material choices The world of technical fabrics is complex and rapidly changing as new materials and fabrication methods emerge. "Smart Fabrics" are playing an increasing role improving our lives while structurally engineered fabrics are being developed that can span immense spaces and achieve life spans of 50 years.

Fabricon was started in 1994 by Mark Welander . this following the sale and operation of Blue Star Canvas Products (beginning in 1977 as Blue Star Tipi until 1982)

Mark, has been a certified Master Fabric Craftsman since 1983 and received lifetime recognition as a Certified Master Fabric Craftsman in 2014 through the IFAI (www.industrialfabricsassociation.com). Mark has served on the Board of Directors of the Fabric Structures Association since 2008 and also received 9 international achievement awards, most recently the Award of Excellence for a frame supported tensile structure on the Rosebud in South Dakota and an Outstanding Achievement Award for a Tensile Canopy used as building entranceway at the University of Alaska Fairbanks.

/products/fabric_structures/deployable.title: Deployable
/products/fabric_structures/deployable.content: Since antiquity man has utilized Deployable fabric structures because their versatility allow the user to change locations of the structure and seasonally take the structure down to avoid exposure to the elements. These structures came be manufactured in a wide variety of materials ensuring the desired outcome is achieved.
